localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Flex Widgets is the first real widget editor for iPhone and iPad. It allows you to build widgets freely by placing elements on them and then editing, moving, resizing and layering those elements. All in a super intuitive editor.
blogPost.body: Flex Widgets is the first real widget editor for iPhone and iPad. It allows you to build widgets freely by placing elements on them and then editing, moving, resizing and layering those elements. All in a super intuitive editor.
blogPost.title: Flex Widgets - A widget editor for iPhone and iPad
blogPost.author: Yannik Schrade

localize.description: Flex Widgets是iPhone和iPad的第一个真正的Widget编辑器。它允许您通过在小部件上放置元素，然后编辑、移动、调整大小和分层这些元素来自由构建小部件。所有这些都在一个超级直观的编辑器中完成。
localize.tagline: 适用于iPhone和iPad的小部件编辑器

localize.description: Flex Widgets是iPhone和iPad的第一個真正的Widget編輯器。它允許您通過在小部件上放置元素，然後編輯、移動、調整大小和分層這些元素來自由構建小部件。所有這些都在一個超級直觀的編輯器中完成。
localize.tagline: 適用於iPhone和iPad的小部件編輯器

previous.excerpt: Data tables are all over the internet, especially Wikipedia. sqanything lets you query the HTML tables in all your open Chrome tabs with SQL. You can send the results of your query to Google Sheets or just send all the tables on a web page to Google Sheets.
previous.title: sqanything - Query any data tables on the Web with SQL

localize.description: sqanything可以让你用SQL查询所有打开的Chrome标签页中的HTML表格。你可以将查询结果发送到Google Sheets，或者只是将网页上的所有表格发送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查询网络上的任何数据表。

localize.description: sqanything可以讓你用SQL查詢所有打開的Chrome標籤頁中的HTML表格。你可以將查詢結果發送到Google Sheets，或者只是將網頁上的所有表格發送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查詢網絡上的任何數據表。
